channel.title: Zermon 718 ll CLUESCROLLS - PkP SYSTEM - FLAWLESS WILDERNESS ll
channel.description:
[center][url=http://Www.Zermon728.Info]Www.Zermon728.Info[/url]
[b]About Zermon 728[/b]
[i]Zermon is a 718 RuneScape Private Server aimed at entertainment made by our Development Team for players. Zermon aims to capture a flawless gameplay experience for our players with features that the community wants rather than what the development team. Zermon has alot of features uncluding Minigames, Quests, Skilling, Pking, pvming and alot more. Please stay up with our community forums to keep up with the latest updates about the server. Zermon focuses on player satiscation with daily updates and a large amount of content available![/i]
[b]Why should I play?[/b][i]
Zermon is a 718 RuneScape Private Server. First, I'd like to say that, I'm the only developer of Zermon 718, and I'm making sure that there will always be made new updates constantly every day and bug-fixes and so on. And I will guarantee you that you will not get bored as there are constantly being updated. We're not like any other 718 servers. We're also offering you loads of points system, so you won't get bored easily, and most of the points can be obained by killing certan npcs. We also have a flawless Wilderness system, in the wilderness you will be rewarded with points, and by the chance you will get the opportunity to buy pvp armor and weapons. So what are you actually waiting for? You can play now instantly and create yourself a new adventure![/i]
[b]Zermon's Features[/b]
[i]VPS Hosted 24/7. Lag Free Server Donation System (Automaticaly) Voting Page (Automaticaly) Webclient Notes Tab Active Staff Members All special attacks + effects. Server Points System Loyalty Points for being active Godwars Bosses Korasi's Sword Flawless Combat Working Shop Interface Buttons Working AutoCasting Working Multi Barrages Working Teleblock Fully Working Plypore Dungeon Corporeal Beast Spirit Shield Creation Private Messaging Summoning Scroll & Pouch creation All Skills are Trainable Working Spellbooks + Prayer book including Turmoil Obtainable Completionist Cape & Trimmed Friends Chat + Symbols Dungeoneering System (Custom) Decent, stable and an enjoyable economy Trading + Tabs 3 Donator Ranks Xp Counter Staff of Light Yell System + Custom tags Custom title Maker Regular Updates [/i] [b]Please be signing up to our forum and make sure you keep an eye on our updates![/b]
[/center]

[center]Www.Zermon728.Info

About Zermon 728

Zermon is a 718 RuneScape Private Server aimed at entertainment made by our Development Team for players. Zermon aims to capture a flawless gameplay experience for our players with features that the community wants rather than what the development team. Zermon has alot of features uncluding Minigames, Quests, Skilling, Pking, pvming and alot more. Please stay up with our community forums to keep up with the latest updates about the server. Zermon focuses on player satiscation with daily updates and a large amount of content available!

Why should I play?[i]

Zermon is a 718 RuneScape Private Server. First, I’d like to say that, I’m the only developer of Zermon 718, and I’m making sure that there will always be made new updates constantly every day and bug-fixes and so on. And I will guarantee you that you will not get bored as there are constantly being updated. We’re not like any other 718 servers. We’re also offering you loads of points system, so you won’t get bored easily, and most of the points can be obained by killing certan npcs. We also have a flawless Wilderness system, in the wilderness you will be rewarded with points, and by the chance you will get the opportunity to buy pvp armor and weapons. So what are you actually waiting for? You can play now instantly and create yourself a new adventure![/i]

Zermon’s Features
